definition: Fukuzawa Yukichi (1835-1901), prominent Japanese Westernizer, liberal educator and founder of Keio University
surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]
pool/pond/(of metals etc) luster/favor or beneficence/damp/moist
surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]

sentences.english: Fukuzawayukichi holds that the final aim of the development of civilization is, the independence of Japanese nation.
sentences.chinese: 福澤諭吉認爲文明發展的最終目的是日本的國家獨立。

sentences.english: It will look at the East-West cultural ideologies from Youwei-kang and Yukichi-Fukuzawa's perspectives in the first section.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分主要探討康有爲與福澤諭吉的東西文化觀。
